name: bracket-pair-colorizer-x
description: BPC 正在死去，VSC 尚未到来。但世界不会再度灼烧，因为你将登上「神」之座。

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.colors.description:
Scope colors
括号的颜色，按列表循环

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.unmatchedScopeC.description:
Unmatched Scope Color
未匹配括号的颜色

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.forceUniqueOpen.description:
Ensure that an opening brackets color does not match a previous brackets color
强制使用独特的颜色，确保开括号的颜色不会与之前的括号颜色相同

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.forceIterationC.description:
Should opening brackets iterate the color cycle even if they are not nested
强制使用颜色循环，确保开括号即使不嵌套也会使用颜色循环

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.colorMode.description:
Should different brackets share a color group (Consecutive), or use their own color group (Independent)
不同括号是否共享颜色组（连续）或使用自己的颜色组（独立）

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.highlightActive.description:
Should the active scope brackets always be highlighted? Recommended to disable editor.matchBrackets if using this feature.
是否高亮显示活动括号范围？建议在使用此功能时禁用编辑器的匹配括号功能。

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.activeScopeCSS.description:
CSS for the active scope. Use {color} to match the bracket color. The string types listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions can be used
活动括号范围的 CSS。使用 {color} 来匹配括号颜色。可以使用 https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions 中列出的字符串类型

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.showBracketsInG.description:
Show active bracket scope in gutter?
在侧边栏显示活动括号范围？

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.showBracketsInR.description:
Show active bracket scope in ruler?
在标尺中显示活动括号范围？

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.rulerPosition.description:
Show active bracket scope in ruler?
在标尺中显示活动括号范围？

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.showVerticalSco.description:
Show a vertical line on the left side of the editor representing the active bracket scope?
在编辑器左侧显示一条垂直线，表示活动括号范围？

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.showHorizontalS.description:
Show a horizontal line to create a block around the active bracket scope?
在活动括号范围周围显示一条水平线以创建一个块？

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.scopeLineRelati.description:
True: Scope Line will start from the ending bracket position. False: Scope Line will always be at column 0
相对位置：Scope Line 将从结束括号位置开始。绝对位置：Scope Line 将始终位于第 0 列

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.scopeLineCSS.description:
CSS for the scope line. Use {color} to match the bracket color. The string types listed at https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions can be used
作用域线的 CSS。使用 {color} 来匹配括号颜色。可以使用 https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/extensionAPI/vscode-api#DecorationRenderOptions 中列出的字符串类型

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.excludedLanguag.description:
Don't colorize files of these languages
不为这些语言的文件着色

bracket-pair-colorizer-x.depreciation-no.description:
Show notice extension is deprecated
显示扩展已弃用的通知
